content: the olivewood cardigan is a gorgeous relaxed cardigan with amazing texture crocheted using a cotton/bamboo yarn this garment drapes beautifully and feels lovely against the skin the sophisticated ribbing cozy pockets and beautiful stitches will have you reaching for this cardigan again and again lightweight level 3 yarn called coboo by lion brand yarn is used sizing is included for small medium large xl 2x 3x 4x and 5x and final dimensions are as follows bust 46 50 54 58 62 66 70 74 to fit actual bust of 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56-58 60-62 length 26 26 26 5 26 5 27 27 27 5 27 5 armhole 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 11 the number of skeins of coboo yarn required are small - 7 skeins medium - 8 skeins large - 9 skeins xl - 9 skeins 2x - 10 skeins 3x - 11 skeins 4x - 11 skeins 5x - 12 skeins the sample is in the olive colorway and i am 5 6 for height reference wearing size s the **free** crochet pattern can be found **here** 1 note that the printable pdf for purchase is a total of 10 pages including the cover page 1 https //www allaboutami com/olivewood-cardigan/
